sentences.en: Am I supposed to apologise for having high standards?
sentences.cn: 你以为我会对有如此高的标准而抱歉 吗 ?

sentences.en: But it has been on my mind for so long, and I apologise if it is irrelevant to some readers.
sentences.cn: 但是它占据我的内心很久了。 如果它与一些读者没有关系，我向你们道歉。

sentences.en: Don't wait for anybody else pain, to ask for apologise, neither separation to make it up.
sentences.cn: 不要等别人受伤了, 才来乞求原谅, 不要等分开了,才想到去挽回.

sentences.en: If anyone has been left out , we apologise for the omission.
sentences.cn: 如果遗漏了某些人, 我们对此深表歉意.

sentences.en: On behalf of my country, I apologise.
sentences.cn: 我谨以国家名义向世界道歉。

sentences.en: We apologise for any embarrassment this may have caused.
sentences.cn: 我们为因此可能带来的尴尬表示歉意。

sentences.en: We apologise for any inconvenience that this may cause.
sentences.cn: 对于由此造成的不便,我们深表歉意.
给您带来的麻烦,我们深表歉意.

sentences.en: We apologise for the volunteers slip - up that lead to the apparent translation problem.
sentences.cn: 志愿者的失误,导致这个翻译出现问题,对此我们表示歉意.

sentences.en: We apologize for the late departure of this flight.
sentences.cn: 本航班延误离境,谨致歉意。

sentences.en: When he received the letter he offered to apologise and to change his comments, but the club rejected this.
sentences.cn: 奈杰尔收到信后，愿意向俱乐部道歉，并修正他的评论，但俱乐部拒绝了这个服软的表示。

sentences.en: When you apologise, no matter who was wrong.
sentences.cn: 当你始觉抱歉, 谁对谁错已经无所谓了.

words.tran_cn: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物

trans.tran_en: to say that you are sorry for doing sth wrong or causing a problem
